price: Kisha baada yao, tukanzisha kizazi kingine.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
footnotes: Tena baada ya kaumu ya Nuhu tukaumba namna ya watu wengine, na wao ni A'adi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
